metadata.description: With a beautiful face and delicate build, he comes in every month on the same day to buy flowers, but who are they for? Should I get the nerve to talk to him? Or would it be weird to talk to him after all this time…? Guided by the small of spring, the buds that have sprouted in their two hearts burst into bloom. Outside of the title story – an eruption of high school fantasies?! Sweet, agonizing love at the age of 17, and new works, all included in this complete collection of short stories!
metadata.name: Scent Of Spring (Yaoi Manga)
